cs351.project2

Class GameWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs351.project2.GameWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleGUIWrapper

    public class GameWindow
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUI
    GameWindow creates the GUI. The GUI is responsible for showing two images: the original image and the image created by the Genetic Algorithm.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GameWindow.Genes
      Genes is an internal class that is used and regulated by the "Show Genome Table" button.

      • getHasSelectedNewImage

        public boolean getHasSelectedNewImage()
        Description copied from interface: GUI
        Allows the evolution engine to ask if there has been a new image selected. This will allow the engine to reinitialize the population. This boolean is turned on by the action listener within the choice box. This is turned to false when the update method occurs from inside the update method of GUI.
        Specified by:
        getHasSelectedNewImage in interface GUI
        Returns:
        True if user has selected a new image since the last update

      • hasUserSignaledQuit

        public boolean hasUserSignaledQuit()
        This is an easy way for outside classes to check to see if the user has requested that the application close itself. Other systems can shut themselves down when this returns true.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
